articles.title: A house-sized asteroid flies by Earth - CNN
articles.description: Asteroid 2022 GN1 flew within 79,000 miles of Earth, about 33% of the way to the moon. Its close flyby was not a safety concern, but did give scientists an exciting opportunity to view and asteroid up close.
